title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Universal Design for Learning-Based Mathematics Education Using Subtitles

context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can create inclusive learning materials for hearing-impaired students by adding subtitles to math concept explanation videos
Learners can explain complex concepts with over 80% comprehension accuracy while watching captioned math problem-solving videos
Learners can propose three or more educational strategies for utilizing subtitles, considering diverse learning styles (visual/auditory)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
